title: VOCColonizer
author: VOCColonizer
content: VOC Colonizer Token ‚öìÔ∏èüá≥üá±The VOC Colonizer Token is a community token that aims to revive the history of the VOC (Dutch East India Company) and colonize the cryptospace, propelling our wealth to unprecedented heights. The creator of the token grew tired of losing funds in various crypto projects and devised an innovative solution to overcome the challenges faced by many crypto tokens.Contract BSC: 0xf86b9dd76Cc6ab6Becfef564346245836bEdF978Website: https://VOCColonizer.comCommunity: https://t.me/VOC_ColonizerToken¬† The majority of crypto projects on the Binance Smart Chain often suffer a swift demise due to a lack of volume. This is primarily because the volume relies solely on investors and hype. Investors quickly sell off their tokens, depleting the liquidity pool, resulting in the project's failure and developers abandoning it, leaving investors in a state of financial loss.¬†The VOC Colonizer Token aims to transport users back in time to the era of the VOC, once the world's largest company. Through trade, the VOC amassed immense wealth and dominated the world's seas. The VOC is back with a mission: to colonize the cryptospace. The token will address the identified problems by functioning as a community-driven token. Taxes levied on token transactions will contribute to building capital. This capital will be used for farming reliable cryptocurrency pairs at high interest rates. The interest earned will be used to buy back and burn the token, making it stronger with every transaction. Token holders with more than 5000 $VOC will receive dividends in the form of BUSD, providing an incentive to hold $VOC and participate in the project's journey towards wealth.¬†¬†Tokenomics- Name: VOC Colonizer Token - Symbol: VOC- Total Supply: 10,000,000Taxation: 10/10- Purchase Tax: 10%- 1% Liquidity Pool- 2% BUSD rewards- 5% Community assets - 2% Marketing- Sale Tax: 10%- 1% Liquidity Pool- 2% BUSD rewards- 5% Community assets - 2% MarketingDistribution:- 70% Presale- 20% Liquidity Pool- 10% TeamThe VOC Colonizer Token implemented a 1-year LP (liquidity pool) lock to enhance the token's stability and prevent sudden price fluctuations. This means that the liquidity provided at the token's launch will be locked for a period of 1 year, providing a secure foundation for the token's value (locked till July 2024)The VOC Colonizer Token operates on the Binance Chain as a BEP20 token. The token utilizes token burning to maintain and increase its value.¬†Use Cases.As a VOC Colonizer Token holder, you become a player in the project. You can participate in community decisions through voting. Staking and investing is performed on your behalf, allowing you to earn a passive income in BUSD.The VOC Colonizer Token adds value to various scenarios by continuously increasing in strength through external financing provided by providing liquidity.¬†TechnologyThe VOC Colonizer Token is built as a BEP20 token on the Binance Chain, a blockchain with low fees and numerous applications. Lucrative farming opportunities exist on this chain.¬†¬†RoadmapQ3 2023:- Creation and presale ‚úÖ- Launch of VOC Colonizer Token on PancakeSwap ‚úÖ- Website and social media establishment ‚úÖ- Extensive marketing campaign ‚úÖ- Deployment of farming mechanism and initial community asset pool ‚úÖ- Achieve 100 token holders ‚úÖQ4 2023:- Expansion of farming mechanism to support multiple assets and tokens- Introduction of new marketing and community development initiatives- Listing on CoinMarketCap (CMC) and CoinGecko - Achieve 500 token holdersQ1 2024:- Implementation of new features and functionality based on community feedback- Continued growth and development of the VOC Colonizer Token ecosystem- Development of a trading game with VOC Colonizer Token rewards- Achieve 1000 token holdersBeyond:- Continued innovation and growth of the VOC Colonizer Token ecosystem- Exploration of new opportunities and markets in the crypto space- COLONIZING CRYPTO SPACE!Achievements: Day 91 of VOC Colonizer Token.Chart: https://poocoin.app/tokens/0xf86b9dd76cc6ab6becfef564346245836bedf978Buybacks from staking profit: $1,773.86Burned: 434,740 $VOCCurrent Marketcap: 55kInvestments: 1% EarnSphere 1 BBX NFT6 EarnSphere NFT

comments.body: Nice.When moon?Really acting like a gov't, though... 10% buy and 10% sell tax. Where are my tulips?
